title: PT 2: We Need To Stop EVERYTHING And Address This Tension In The Studio
description:
There's some MAJOR tension in the studio this morning, and it all has to do with a story our Producer Romeo told. He was talking about a "friend" of his who invited his ex and the current woman he's dating to the same event.
During this story, Moe started poking holes in it, and this so-called "friend" was exposed! Romeo was talking about someone in the studio, and now they're going to address everything!
